description: This file defines a bottom navigation system for a Flutter application. It includes a controller class 'BottomNavController' for managing the selected tab index and a widget 'OceanBottomNavBar' that renders a Material 3 adaptive bottom navigation bar with four tabs: Dashboard, Consult, Records, and Profile.

classes.name: BottomNavController
classes.description: A controller class extending ChangeNotifier to manage and notify status changes of the selected navigation tab.

classes.name: OceanBottomNavBar
classes.description: A stateless widget that renders a bottom navigation bar with four navigable tabs.

methods.name: setIndex
methods.description: Updates the current tab index and notifies listeners if the index has changed.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the NavigationBar widget with appropriate destinations and handles tab selection.
